title: Took a two week break
body:
I took  two week break cause ranked games were terrible.  Came back:

* Game 1: We're winning hard.  My jungle gets his red buff taken and tells my bot lane to slit their throats and kill themselves.  My bot lane stops playing and I lose.   I guess I should have played better.

* Game 2:  My bot lane afks at their tower and lets the enemy team invade me putting me behind in jungle.  Then every lane loses solo and goes 0/5.  My mid laner flames my bot lane hard.  I explain to my bot lane how they fucked up the game by not doing point defense.  I get a chat ban.  Yawn.  I should have play better I guess.  

* Game 3:   Every lane hard ints . My mid laner rages at my bot lane.   I went like 4/4/2 early.    They all went 0/5.   I should have played better I guess.  

Yep.  League is a fun game.

> * Game 2:  My bot lane afks at their tower and lets the enemy team invade me putting me behind in jungle.  Then every lane loses solo and goes 0/5.  My mid laner flames my bot lane hard.  I explain to my bot lane how they fucked up the game by not doing point defense.  I get a chat ban.  Yawn.  I should have play better I guess.  
> 
> * Game 3:   Every lane hard ints . My mid laner rages at my bot lane.   I went like 4/4/2 early.    They all went 0/5.   I should have played better I guess.  
> 
> Yep.  League is a fun game.

i checked your first game, your bot lane has deaths on the map at the 32 minute mark, and 38 minute mark. doesn't look like they afk'd matter of fact your support equals your level, and the adc is lvl 17 while you're lvl 14 as the midlaner, if they afk'd what the fk did you do? you're lying. and yes you should've played way way way way way way way better. 0/7 lulu with 44 cs and 2,5k damage dealt to champs in the midlane, what's your excuse for inting the game away?

your 2nd game was a hard stomp, get the fuck out with your bullshit, no way you win that one even if god himself descended into your teammates and tried to 1v9. what did you expect your bot to do lmao, and congrats you told them how they lost you the game, way to own up to your own mistakes. even if you did perfect, shit like this happens

your 3rd game, you did ok, but couldn't carry unlucky. however here you are calling them inters when you were them in the first game. therefor you are a massive hypocrite.  also karthus jungle, press R for kill. who's to say you even ganked or helped

if you wanna come here and complain how garbage the game is and how shit it is that your team loses you games, then fine but atleast be honest

you're obviously a smurf too, bronze 1 in february 16, plat 3 in april 12th with no rank in the previous seasons. so you should be the one hard carrying considering you're already ruining games by smurfing. 

i'd expect you to complain about autofill or something, you're clearly a support main on that account. the 3 games you described are you in mid-jgl-gl. 

also your previous matches before these, were 7 and 8 days ago  so your title is already a lie, and you expected us to believe you on your word that your allies did all those things? i only checked your op.gg due to sheer boredom and some curiosity

I mean you could actually just watch the games if you insist on running your mouth.  

Game 1:  I'm funnel Lulu.  Are you serious?   They maybe didn't afk in the fountain but they walked aimlessly around our jungle typing and dying.  

Game 2:  Okay, they fucked up hard and raged.  That's exactly what I said happened.  Thanks for verifying.  

Game 3:  Same thing. 

Send me a friend request.  You can watch the games and then come back here and post a formal apology.  Oh, you probably won't do that because your'e a League of Legends player.
funneling hasn't worked in awhile since they put that restriction it.

> [{quoted}](name=TheGreatNinx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=000b00000001,timestamp=2019-04-12T22:23:51.070+0000)

It does work still.  You just have to adapt the strategy.  Have you seen ratirl?
Lol I can watch your games and point out a million ways you fuck up. But hey, I'm not an expert. Get an actual coach to review your games and laugh at how bad you are.

You're acting like when people rewatch your games they're gonna be impressed and be like "ioh so sorry, you deserve to win these games" smh. You probably couldn't even rewatch your own games and not cringe at some of the shit you do. Unless you're completely narcissistic/delusional.
I'll watch them.

lel

Game 1) Pyke gave FB at level 1. Died more at 11:00

(Not as cut and dry as you make it out to be).

Game 2) Hard stomp? Looked more like 1 person playing and 4 afking while the other team did a down mid clear by 20 min with no resistance. Bot was level 7/8 at 19 minutes. 7/8 is a level you are at bot at 9:00, not 19  minutes.

Game 3) I'd argue Deus  sucked. 4/4/2 is what got the other team started. Amumu snowballed off him and took over the game in full roam mode. A fed Amumu just takes over games with current ratios.
The real MVP, saying what all of us are thinking.

The Only Constant in Your Games is You™

(if it wasn't obvious from the tm and caps, this is sarcasm. I main tanks and supports so I know all too well how it feels to have 0 fucking agency over the results of your games)

> [{quoted}](name=PopcornBunni,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-04-12T05:51:42.705+0000)
>
> The Only Constant in Your Games is You™
> 
> (if it wasn't obvious from the tm and caps, this is sarcasm. I main tanks and supports so I know all too well how it feels to have 0 fucking agency over the results of your games)

I mean you can influence your games but when your team is typing instead of playing the entire game its just doomed.  Sadly that's like every platinum game so I just get bored.

If it makes you feel better, somewhere someone who is playing League is bizzarro you: for every AFK, troll, rager you get, he gets them on the opposite team. 

League is so enjoyable to play.
I play with the thought in my mind that I am the bizarro me. For every inter on my team I accept that it is time for regular me to get an ez win

> [{quoted}](name=Morgana Deus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-12T05:02:41.474+0000)

Nope.  Talking at all is bannable if its arguing.  I explained to them repeatedly how plat players shouldn't afk and should do point defense.  I got told I was r%%%%%ed etc.   Oh well.
Post unedited logs

> [{quoted}](name=Morgana Deus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-04-12T06:44:04.883+0000)
>
> Nope.  Talking at all is bannable if its arguing.  I explained to them repeatedly how plat players shouldn't afk and should do point defense.  I got told I was r%%%%%ed etc.   Oh well.

Riot always seems willing to stick up for the toxic griefing players and changing the definition of toxic to suit their BS.  I am a little worried about how fundamentally robotic they are these days in regards to ranked players and don't appreciate support telling me it is a developer problem when literally it isn't the developers in charge of behavior.

But they should be in charge considering everyone can see the BS that is ranked right now and they aren't complaining about game balance other than Vayne for the most part.

 {{champion:517}}  **FIRE THE SJW BEHAVIOR FOR 2018-2019** {{item:1031}} **RAISE YOUR CHAINS!** {{item:1031}}  **RANKED GAMERS RISE UP** {{champion:517}}

> [{quoted}](name=Unstoppable Monk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=000400000003,timestamp=2019-04-12T18:08:54.815+0000)
>
> Riot always seems willing to stick up for the toxic griefing players and changing the definition of toxic to suit their BS.  I am a little worried about how fundamentally robotic they are these days in regards to ranked players and don't appreciate support telling me it is a developer problem when literally it isn't the developers in charge of behavior.
> 
> But they should be in charge considering everyone can see the BS that is ranked right now and they aren't complaining about game balance other than Vayne for the most part.
> 
>  {{champion:517}}  **FIRE THE SJW BEHAVIOR FOR 2018-2019** {{item:1031}} **RAISE YOUR CHAINS!** {{item:1031}}  **RANKED GAMERS RISE UP** {{champion:517}}

To be fair player behavior is a money sink.  It just wastes their time.   I think it's a sign they should just give up on moderating all but the worst behavior, but you know they're in california.

It's not impossible to improve and remove the dumb stuff.  It's just patting themselves on the head for a job well done when the system is just being gamed by toxics and decided on muh progressiveness in gutting the fuck out of normal players that try to explain things out.  It's just censorship at that point.


The fact is Riot is funneling toxic games right into ranked because it is unlocked by the increased exp gains to create fresh from ARAM ranked players.   They are unskilled, toxic, annoying, and clump together to slam normal ranked players with reports.  The novices should be well the fuck away from ranked AND it twice as easy to troll ranked from a toxic player's perspective with no investment in the account needed.

Accessibility into ranked is DESTROYING the quality of ranked game more than any other reason including game balance, smurfs, hard griefing, autofill, bugs, scripting, and botting.

> [{quoted}](name=Unstoppable Monk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=00040000000300000000,timestamp=2019-04-12T20:06:35.667+0000)
>
> It's not impossible to improve and remove the dumb stuff.  It's just patting themselves on the head for a job well done when the system is just being gamed by toxics and decided on muh progressiveness in gutting the fuck out of normal players that try to explain things out.  It's just censorship at that point.
> 
> 
> The fact is Riot is funneling toxic games right into ranked because it is unlocked by the increased exp gains to create fresh from ARAM ranked players.   They are unskilled, toxic, annoying, and clump together to slam normal ranked players with reports.  The novices should be well the fuck away from ranked AND it twice as easy to troll ranked from a toxic player's perspective with no investment in the account needed.
> 
> Accessibility into ranked is DESTROYING the quality of ranked game more than any other reason including game balance, smurfs, hard griefing, autofill, bugs, scripting, and botting.

I think boosting is just too prevalent.  There is no excuse for a platinum level player to ever be blown away so hard they die 15 times in a ranked game.  Yet I see it all the time.  Platinum may not be the best elo, but it's definitely at the top of the play base.

> [{quoted}](name=Morgana Deus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=000400000003000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-12T20:32:54.677+0000)
>
> I think boosting is just too prevalent.  There is no excuse for a platinum level player to ever be blown away so hard they die 15 times in a ranked game.  Yet I see it all the time.  Platinum may not be the best elo, but it's definitely at the top of the play base.

Yes and no.  I agree that boosters are real since season 4.  But there's also certain carry kits that boost their own bonobos and get ranked without even respecting the game.  The lack of clarity in knowing your allies rank at champ select just ends up biasing it toward carries so you end up with a pool of people who can't play anything else with the game knowledge and attitude of a level 40 bronze.  But yeah I've seen a lot of people boost people out of bronze into silver and it just adds to the difficulty because noobs are noobs.  When that happens people who are less skilled take games from these kiddos so gold elo is a wasteland now.

> [{quoted}](name=Morgana Deus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-04-12T06:44:04.883+0000)

Does "repeatedly" mean you argued with them nonstop the entire game long? Does "plat players shouldn't afk" mean you announced you were reporting them for AFKing and encouraged the other players in the match to send reports as well?

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=000400000001,timestamp=2019-04-12T07:11:54.513+0000)

Nope.  They complained and I repeatedly told them why it was their fault.

> [{quoted}](name=Morgana Deus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=0004000000010000,timestamp=2019-04-12T07:28:23.252+0000)

And do you think that constant fingerpointing is a positive use of the chat, rather than non-constructive harassment that goes against Riot's rules for behavior?

If they were AFK and it didn't matter, what was the point of harassing them in chat? And, obviously, either they saw it or it bothered the non-AFK teammates, because someone reported it.

With any luck, this chat restriction will reduce your toxicity and help you win more games.

It's an amazing game and a lot of fun that's for sure.
You need to be able to carry the whole team, because you're playing a team game alone. People don't understand that.

Why would anyone care if their acc would be banned if making another one is matter of minutes?

Back when player had to actually put an effort in collecting runes noone really wanted to lose their accounts. What's more Riot doesn't restrict players by their actions, but by whatever they said, which is just r%%%%%ed way of fixing the symptomps, but not the disease.

Riot focus to flamers and never look the feeders the trollers they make the game look very very bad... They lose sooooo many players every year... I hope they try to fix the community of the game.. Stop making new skin and champs and focusing more too the game!!!

Oh man! Too bad you didn't carry your team! Oh wait, you can't carry anymore by Riot's piss poor design. 

I'm sure there's some ass kisser out there who can perform some amazing mental gymnastics in order to blame you for that though.

> [{quoted}](name=Morgana Deus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-12T05:02:41.474+0000)

sure....

I always get chat bans for explaining to people.

give us some good content, post your logs bro

i need a good laugh

> Game 1: We're winning hard. My jungle gets his red buff taken and tells my bot lane to slit their throats and kill themselves. My bot lane stops playing and I lose. I guess I should have played better.
> 
> Game 2: My bot lane afks at their tower and lets the enemy team invade me putting me behind in jungle. Then every lane loses solo and goes 0/5. My mid laner flames my bot lane hard. I explain to my bot lane how they fucked up the game by not doing point defense. I get a chat ban. Yawn. I should have play better I guess.
> 
> Game 3: Every lane hard ints . My mid laner rages at my bot lane. I went like 4/4/2 early. They all went 0/5. I should have played better I guess.

Actually, yes you should have :
- Played better
- Talked less (or talked to give moral back)
- Focus on what you can change (hint : you can't change your teammates)

upon reviewing your opgg:  yes you should have played better :

https://i.imgur.com/EMvReIe.png

Game 1 your botlane outlevels you while they stopped playing ? Sure. At least take revitalize when you try a lulu laner with a lot of carry ad. And be aware that you can actually use spells to damage ennemies. You were so useless in this game.

Also game 2 and 3 were you duoing with your unranked friend terminatar ? Might explain the beating since he did poorly as well, both games.

> [{quoted}](name=Starcraft243ver,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KZd7J0e2,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2019-04-12T17:08:57.014+0000)

> - Talked less (or talked to give moral back)
> - Focus on what you can change (hint : you can't change your teammates)

> upon reviewing your opgg:  yes you should have played better :
> 
> https://i.imgur.com/EMvReIe.png
> 
> Game 1 your botlane outlevels you while they stopped playing ? Sure. At least take revitalize when you try a lulu laner with a lot of carry ad. And be aware that you can actually use spells to damage ennemies. You were so useless in this game.
> 
> Also game 2 and 3 were you duoing with your unranked friend terminatar ? Might explain the beating since he did poorly as well, both games.

I don't usually Lulu mid but I was asked to and I try to play around my teammates.  While my damage as low, I did rotate and save my Twitch A LOT and my macro level decisions were good.  

We really only lost that game because our bot lane gave up and argued with the Twitch.
I took a week break so far and really don't miss the stress of one sided games. I'm feeling better for it
Take a longer break break...you literally waited the equivalent of one patch and expect the game to do a 180?

I started the year by saying that, even through my studies, I'll actually play ranked by myself instead of being dragged to it by my friends.

Needless to say, this didn't age well
Was hoping to look at your op.gg and catch you in a lie, but your most recent Karthus game is ridiculous. 3 golds including a gold 4 on your side against 4 plats and one unranked account.
This is why I do not and will never play ranked games. Nah im sticking to Intermediate AI and normal matches. All 3 maps. And Im good there.

I've left for a bit and came back, after a Terraria and Stardew Valley binge, and sometimes I forget that games are meant to be for fun rather than just. a time filler, I guess? Idk, that toxicity hit like a truck when i came back honestly, and may take a break until the new enchanter is out (cuz I love enchanters) because that break felt super nice.
Welcome back!
